column5: I checked the river about 4 times this year, 2 of those times the fish were running pretty good. It was a later start this year, but not off by that much. These photos were from last week.  Nipfisher focusing hard on the shiny fish     Part of the catch!!    I only kept about 100 fish this year.... 25 for bait, 25 already eaten and the rest will get shared with family. I've learned that I don't like frozen smelt all that much and there is no point in wasting. For all the effort I put into smelting, it's more about the experience than the numbers.
i've seen guys with buckets last week...is there a limit for smelt?
No possession limit... But after cleaning a couple hundred you may have a personal limit hahah
people just fry them without cleaning!
Are you serious? Mmmmmm.......fresh fish guts, can't get enough.
No need to eat the guts.. Just peel the flesh away from the spine and belly.
Last year, I froze them whole and just cleaned them as I used them. I learned not to wait till they are completely thawed.... gross hahaha.
